title: Collaboration
description: I'm passionate about finding and creating awesome teams. Because of this, I keep tools such as Scrum, Pair- and mob programming as well as documentation of workflows readily available.

title: Growth
description: I'm on a lifelong quest of knowledge and improvement, both in myself but also to elevate others. Because of this, I enjoy taking on a mentoring role and spreading the gospel of JavaScript in my working environment. In my spare time I like to grow my developer skills through a selection of different projects that includes both testing new technologies as well as refine the knowledge already aquired.

title: Challenges
description: I enjoy taking on new challenges and thrive in a problem-solving environment. There's something inherently intriguing about taking on a brand new challenge and finding ways to break it into smaller subsets that can be understood and tackled, this has (besides making me passionate about programming) led to a strong competitive side that enjoys sports, games and all other sorts of friendly competition.
